mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cameron, Simon to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cameron, Simon
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 20 1861. By Telegraph from Washington 20 1861. We may avoid all necessary foreign militia urge the speedy organization of volunteers Do nothing in regard to temporary forces unless a formal requisition is made by the president Simon Cameron Secy War 29G73pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cameron, Simon
Washington, DC
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
